snippet: Video and photos taken by a Times reporter, Anne Barnard, show both scenes of destruction and a seemingly normal city: people just continuing on with their daily lives....
abstract: Reporter's Notebook; largely-intact government-held sections of Aleppo, Syria, present stark contrast with destroyed areas held by rebels, both in terms of physical landscape and sense of normality.
lead_paragraph: Video and photos taken by a Times reporter, Anne Barnard, show both scenes of destruction and a seemingly normal city: people just continuing on with their daily lives.

headline.main: My Journey Into Aleppo: Watching a Moonscape of War Turn Into a Functioning City
headline.print_headline: Journey Into Aleppo: Amid Moonscape of War, a Functioning City
